snapshot.blocks.big-bang-international.copy.body: A hotel in Rome loses bookings when German tourists can't find check-in info. A restaurant in Tokyo loses reservations when English speakers can't find hours. Every unanswered question in their language is a lost customer. Ombra solves this: website URL → personalized FAQ in 29 languages, instantly.
snapshot.blocks.big-bang-international.copy.headl: International customers don't wait for translations
